definitions.definition: a person who delivers a speech or lecture.
examples: speechmaker, lecturer, talker, speechifier, orator, declaimer, rhetorician; Morespokesperson, spokesman, spokeswoman, mouthpiece; reader, lector, commentator, broadcaster, narrator; informalspieler; historicaldemagogue, rhetor "Reverend Graham is one of the guest speakers"Morespokesperson, spokesman, spokeswoman, mouthpiece; reader, lector, commentator, broadcaster, narrator; spieler; demagogue, rhetor Reverend Graham is one of the guest speakers

definitions.definition: a person who speaks a specified language.
examples: he is a fluent English and French speaker

definitions.definition: the presiding officer in a legislative assembly, especially the House of Representatives.

examples: a cassette player with two speakers
